title: The.Incredible.Adventures.of.Van.Helsing.II-CODEX
description:
CODEX PRESENTS:


                The Incedible Advantures of van Helsing II

 Release Date :  5/2014                         Protection : Steam
 Discs        :  1                              Genre      : Game


So the incredible adventures continue, and Van Helsing, the famous
monster hunter returns to save the day again with the help of his
ghostly companion, Lady Katarina. In the second part of the unfolding
saga that could also be enjoyed independently, you can explore new
corners of this unique world and experience the mix of old-school...


- Extract
- Burn or mount the .iso
- Run setup.exe and install
- Copy crack from CODEX folder to your installdir
- Play


Block game exe in your firewall to prevent the game from trying to go
online ..


                    CODEX is currently looking for:

                       nothing but competition!

                           are you ready?

    LNK^CPS                                                02/2014
